AreYouSureDelete: Are you sure you want to delete
AreYouSureWantStartBlind: Are you sure you want to start translating?
ConflictTitle: There are conflicts, we need to fix them
CreationRules:
It will work like this.
The first step is to upload a file with a config, where all the steps will be written, etc.
The second step is to indicate links to resources
The third step is to indicate the code of the book, for which we are creating a package
After this, we need to click the "Generate" button, and we will have an archive with all the settings and files
DescriptionConfession:
consistent with the historical symbols of faith:
The Apostolic Creed, the Nicene Creed, and the Athanasian Creed; as well as the Lausanne Covenant.
TextDescriptionWord: Write the meaning of the word
TurnMicrophone: The V-Cana app needs access to the microphone. Click on the icon of the locked camera (microphone) in the address bar. Allow access and reload the page.
